import React from 'react' import useForm from '../hooks/useForm' import form from './formComponents/form.css' function MasterForm() { const initialValues = { /////Personal Information Section///// auditorName: '', email: '', school: '', teacher: '', student: '', studentID: '', dateOfBirth: '', grade: 0, race: '', classification: '', dateOfAudit: '', /////General Information Section///// genOneBool: '', genOneFind: '', genOneFix: '', primaryLanguage: '', genTwoFind: '', genTwoFix: '', genThreeBool: '', genThreeFind: '', genThreeFix: '', genFourBool: '', genFourFind: '', genFourFix: '', genFiveBool: '', genFiveFind: '', genFiveFix: '', genSixBool: '', genSixFind: '', genSixFix: '', genSevenBool: '', genSevenFind: '', genSevenFix: '', genEightBool: '', genEightFind: '', genEightFix: '', evalType: '', /////Eligibility Section///// eligOneBool: '', eligTwoBool: '', eligThreeDetermination: '', eligFourBool: '', eligFiveBool: '', eligSixBool: '', eligSevenBool: '', eligEightBool: '', eligNineBool: '', eligTenBool: '', eligElevenBool: '', eligTwelveBool: '', eligThirteenBool: '', eligFourteenBool: '', eligFifteenBool: '', eligSixteenBool: '', eligSeventeenBool: '', eligEighteenBool: '', eligNineteenBool: '', eligTwentyBool: '', eligTwentyOneBool: '', eligTwentyTwoBool: '', eligTwentyThreeBool: '', eligTwentyFourBool: '', eligOneFind: '', eligTwoFind: '', eligFourFind: '', eligFiveFind: '', eligSixFind: '', eligSevenFind: '', eligEightFind: '', eligNineFind: '', eligTenFind: '', eligElevenFind: '', eligTwelveFind: '', eligThirteenFind: '', eligFourteenFind: '', eligFifteenFind: '', eligSixteenFind: '', eligSeventeenFind: '', eligEighteenFind: '', eligNineteenFind: '', eligTwentyFind: '', eligTwentyOneFind: '', eligTwentyTwoFind: '', eligTwentyThreeFind: '', eligTwentyFourFind: '', eligOneFix: '', eligTwoFix: '', eligFourFix: '', eligFiveFix: '', eligSixFix: '', eligSevenFix: '', eligEightFix: '', eligNineFix: '', eligTenFix: '', eligElevenFix: '', eligTwelveFix: '', eligThirteenFix: '', eligFourteenFix: '', eligFifteenFix: '', eligSixteenFix: '', eligSeventeenFix: '', eligEighteenFix: '', eligNineteenFix: '', eligTwentyFix: '', eligTwentyOneFix: '', eligTwentyTwoFix: '', eligTwentyThreeFix: '', eligTwentyFourFix: '', dateOfLastEval: '', dateOfConsent: '', dateOfERS: '', dateOfLastObservation: '', /////IEP Section///// IEPOneBool: '', IEPTwoBool: '', IEPThreeBool: '', IEPFourBool: '', IEPFiveBool: '', IEPSixBool: '', IEPSevenBool: '', IEPEightBool: '', IEPNineBool: '', IEPTenBool: '', IEPElevenBool: '', IEPTwelveBool: '', IEPThirteenBool: '', IEPFourteenBool: '', IEPFifteenBool: '', IEPSixteenBool: '', IEPSeventeenBool: '', IEPOneFind: '', IEPTwoFind: '', IEPThreeFind: '', IEPFourFind: '', IEPFiveFind: '', IEPSixFind: '', IEPSevenFind: '', IEPEightFind: '', IEPNineFind: '', IEPTenFind: '', IEPElevenFind: '', IEPTwelveFind: '', IEPThirteenFind: '', IEPFourteenFind: '', IEPFifteenFind: '', IEPSixteenFind: '', IEPSeventeenFind: '', IEPOneFix: '', IEPTwoFix: '', IEPThreeFix: '', IEPFourFix: '', IEPFiveFix: '', IEPSixFix: '', IEPSevenFix: '', IEPEightFix: '', IEPNineFix: '', IEPTenFix: '', IEPElevenFix: '', IEPTwelveFix: '', IEPThirteenFix: '', IEPFourteenFix: '', IEPFifteenFix: '', IEPSixteenFix: '', IEPSeventeenFix: '', dateOfCurrentIEP: '', dateOfPreviousIEP: '', ESYDecision: '', /////Transition Section///// STROneBool: '', STRTwoBool: '', STRThreeBool: '', STRFourBool: '', STRFiveBool: '', STRSixBool: '', STRSevenBool: '', STREightBool: '', STRNineBool: '', STRTenBool: '', STRElevenBool: '', STROneFind: '', STRTwoFind: '', STRThreeFind: '', STRFourFind: '', STRFiveFind: '', STRSixFind: '', STRSevenFind: '', STREightFind: '', STRNineFind: '', STRTenFind: '', STRElevenFind: '', STROneFix: '', STRTwoFix: '', STRThreeFix: '', STRFourFix: '', STRFiveFix: '', STRSixFix: '', STRSevenFix: '', STREightFix: '', STRNineFix: '', STRTenFix: '', STRElevenFix: '', transitionDate: '', }; const { values, errors, touched, handleChange, handleSubmit } = useForm({ initialValues, onSubmit: values => console.log({ values }) }); return (

Date of Audit

Date of birth

{/* field label left blank to provide spacing for student information section */}

1.0 General Information


{'Is the file organized in the new format (1.14)?'}

{'Primary Language?'}

{'Is the home language different than the primary language? (2.18) (3.17)'}

{'Alternative Language Services Consulted for primary language other than English?'}

{'Is there a signed Medicaid form (Attached to front of file) (1.1)'}

{'Is the box giving consent on the Medicaid form checked (1.2)'}

{'Initial placement in file? (1.3)'}

{'Is the box on the initial placement form checked? (1.4)'}

{'Evaluation type'}

2.0 Eligibility


{'Is the Eligibility for this student current? (2.1)'}

{'Date of eligibility determination (2.8)'}

{'Eligibility determination'}

{'Is the student eligible for special education services?'}

{'Was the parent input used to determine eligibility? (2.16)'}

{'Was a data review completed (in file and signed)? (2.9)'}

{/* NEEDS DATE PICKER */}

{`Date of data review. (2.7)`}

{/* Needs date selector instead of bool or finding */}

{'Was the existing data sufficient?'}

{'If data is sufficient, what is the date of the last evaluation(s) used to determine eligibility?'}

{'Was the data review completed prior to consent? (2.10)'}

{'Is there a completed consent form in the file (signed by parent)?'}

{'Date of Consent (signature date)'}

{'Were all concerns on the data review consented? (2.3)'}

{'Was consent obtained for all areas that were assessed? (2.2)'}

{'Were all areas consented tested? (2.5)'}

{'Was testing completed after consent but prior to eligibility. (2.4)'}

{'Was the eligibility completed within 45 days of receiving consent? (2.6)'}

{'Does the file contain an ERS? (2.15)'}

{'ERS date'}

{'Hearing data on the ERS (2.17)'}

{'Vision data on the ERS (2.17)'}

{'Medical history on the ERS (2.11) (2.12) (2.19)'}

{'Medical history in file (2.11) (2.12) (2.19)'}

{'Required observations are documented on the ERS (2.13) (2.14)'}

{'Required observations are in the file (2.13) (2.14)'}

{'Date of last observation in file'}

{'Does the file contain a Notice of Meeting for eligibility? (1.5) (1.10)'}

3.0 IEP


{'Is the IEP current? (3.1)'}

{'Date of current IEP (3.7)'}

{'Date of Previous IEP (3.7)'}

{'Does the file contain a Notice of Meeting for current IEP? (1.6) (1.11) (1.13)'}

{'Does the file contain a Notice of Meeting for previous IEP? (1.7)(1.12)'}

{'Parent participated in meeting (3.11)'}

{'LEA representative participated in meeting (3.8) (3.9)'}

{'Special education teacher participated in meeting (3.8) (3.9)'}

{'General education teacher participated in meeting (3.8) (3.9)'}

{'IWas the PLAAFP written to include baseline or current data? (3.6)'}

{'Does the PLAAFP include how the disability affects the involvement/progress with general curriculum? (3.2)'}

{'Does the IEP state the amount of time and frequency for related services?'}

{'Does the IEP state the frequency of modifications/services/supports in the general classroom?'}

{'Do the IEP goals address areas of educational need? (3.3) (3.4) (3.5)'}

{'Do the goals state the skill, condition, and criterion? (what the student will do, when and how, acceptable level of performance) (3.16)'}

{'Does the IEP contain a description of how student progress will be monitored?'}

{`Does the student's IEP indicate if ESY services are needed? (3.10) (3.14)`}

{'Progress reports documenting progress from the current IEP (1.8,1.9)'}

{'Are signed meeting notes for the IEP included in fie? (3.15)'}

{'Does the file have a current SCRAM? (3.12)'}

{'Do the SCRAM and IEP minutes match? (3.13)'}

{`4.0 Secondary Transition Requirements (14yrs. and older)`}


{`PLAAFP statement addresses transitions strengths and needs. (4.1) (4.6)`}

{`Student's measurable long-range post school goals are based on student's preferences and interests? (4.2)`}

{`The goal meets the following Transition area(s): (E) Education, (EMP) Employment, (IL) Independent Living. (Check mark indicates goal meets criteria.). (4.2)`}

{`Do transition services include courses of study that align with the student's post secondary goals? (4.8)`}

{`Is there an annual goal on the IEP that is related to the student's transition service needs? (4.7)`}

{`Was the student invited to the IEP meeting? (1.13)`}

{`Was an outside agency invited to participate in the IEP? (1.13)`}

{`If an outside agency was invited to the IEP, did parent sign consent for outside agency participation prior to Notice of Meeting? (1.13) (4.10)`}

{`Was an age appropriate transition assessment conducted (4.4)`}

{`Date transition assessment was conducted `}

{`Summary of performance in file? (4.5)`}

{`Age of majority in file? (4.3)`}

) } export default MasterForm
